name: Disco Bouncer
description:
Welcome!

This game has been a group effort of Maestro Oak, Peter Stensgaard,  Matthew Leonard [Topper]. Together we call ourselves Chemically Incorrect.

This simple game is our first project meant to help us learn all about the different aspects of game making. We hope whoever plays it will have fun for the few minutes the game lasts.

If you have any questions, tips, criticisms, concerns, and advice to give, you can contact us at TopperVideoGames@gmail.com.  

You can follow us on the Chemically Incorrect Tumblr

And you can follow Topper with @Topper_Games

The browser version works best when played in Firefox and Chrome.

Thank you for your time!
